fog.config.option.description.disable_mo: Disables the mod entirely, e.g. to compare to vanilla Minecraft.
fog.config.option.description.initial_fo: The initial (when the fog modifications are loaded) distance from the camera at which fog starts to appear, expressed as a percentage of view distance.
The initial (when the fog modifications are loaded) distance from the camera at which fog is fully opaque, expressed as a percentage of view distance.
fog.config.option.description.rain_fog_m: The density and darkness of fog during rain, snow and/or thunder.
fog.config.option.description.undergroun: The density of fog when underground.
fog.config.option.description.disable_bi: Disables biome-specific fog colors, which makes the fog color change based on the biome the player is in.
fog.config.option.description.disabled_b: Disables all fog modifications in the specified biomes.
fog.config.option.description.fog_start_: The speed at which the fog start distance transitions. Lower values result in smoother transitions.
fog.config.option.description.fog_end_tr: The speed at which the fog end distance transitions. Lower values result in smoother transitions.
fog.config.option.description.fog_color_: The speed at which the fog color transitions to match environmental changes. Lower values result in smoother color changes.
fog.config.option.description.raininess_: The speed at which fog changes color and density during a weather transition. Lower values result in smoother transitions.
fog.config.option.description.undergroun: The speed at which fog transitions when underground. Lower values result in smoother transitions.
fog.config.option.description.darkness_t: The speed at which the darkness effect transitions. Lower values result in smoother transitions.
fog.config.option.description.start_mult: The speed at which the fog start multiplier transitions. Lower values result in smoother transitions.
fog.config.option.description.end_multip: The speed at which the fog end multiplier transitions. Lower values result in smoother transitions.
fog.config.option.description.disable_mo: Disables the Moon's influence on the fog color, which depends on the Moon's phase.
fog.config.option.description.new_moon_c: The fog color during a New Moon.
fog.config.option.description.disable_su: Disables the Sun's influence on the fog color during sunrises and sunsets.
fog.config.option.description.disable_cl: Disables the cloud whitening effect, which unlinks cloud color from fog color. This is disabled when Sodium is present as Sodium does this by default.
fog.config.option.description.enableHigh: Should the fog color match the sky when at high altitudes? Useful for flying at high altitudes with the elytra to prevent the weird horizon issues. This may cause issues in worlds with non-standard world heights.
fog.config.option.disableWhenIrisActive: Disable Mod When Iris Is Active
fog.config.option.description.disableWhe: Disables Fog when an Iris shader pack is active.
fog.config.option.description.prioritize: Prioritizes fog definitions from a Polytone resource pack over fog definitions from Fog resource packs.
fog.command.reset: Reset Fog modifications to the initial values specified in the configuration options.
fog.command.debug.failure: An error occurred while getting debug information.
